lines.text: Well, here we are! Pismo Beach and all the clams we can eat!
What a way for a duck to travel. Underground. Hey, wait a minute! Since when is Pismo Beach inside a cave?
[Daffy's eyes glaze over as he sees the treasure; Bugs doesn't notice it]
I wonder... You know, I just bet we shoulda turned left at Albuquerque, and then maybe a right turn at La Jolla. Hmm, er... Well, we can't be too far off, so if we...

[pushing Bugs down into the burrow]
It's mine, you understand? Mine! All mine! Get back in there! Down, down, down! Go, go, go! Mine, mine, mine! Mwa-ha-ha-ha!
[repeated lines]
Hassan chop!
What's with you, anyway?
I can't help it. I'm a greedy slob. It's my hobby. Save me!
Guard well this treasure, oh, Hassan, or the jackals shall grow fat on thy carcass!
No one shall pass Hassan!
Duck, you have desecrated the spirit of the lamp! Prepare to take the consequences!
Consequences, shmonsequences, as long as I'm rich.
I'm rich. I'm wealthy. Yahoo. I'm comfortably well off.
Eh, what's up, duck?
Duh, open, uh, sarsaparilla? Uh, open Saskatchewan?
Open, septuagenarian? Uh, open, saddle soap? Open, sesame?
[last lines]

[opening a clam]
I wonder how that crazy duck ever made out with that genie? Hey, whaddya know, a pearl!
[a shrunken Daffy runs out of the hole and goes for the pearl]
It's mine, you understand? Mine, mine! All mine! Go, go, go! Mine, do you hear me? Out, out, out! Mine, mine, mine! Go away! There's only enough for me!
Oh, brother. Close, sesame.
[Bugs closes the clam on Daffy]
I'm rich. I'm a happy miser.
[first lines]
Close sesame.
I'm rich! I'm wealthy! I'm independent! I'm socially secure!

[to Hassan]
Ah, redcap. Call me a cab, boy, and be quick about it. I'm a heavy tipper.

[as he sits in a bottle]
Me Genie, the light, brown hare!
Oh, Mighty Genie.
Release me, and I shall grant thee a rich reward.
He's lyin'! Chop 'im! Chop 'im!
Hassan release you, oh, Master.
[He shakes Bugs out of the bottle]
Thank you, Hassan. Now, wouldst thou like to have all this treasure for thy very own?
Oh, yes, Master. Hassan like. Hassan like!
Very well. Ickity ackity ooh, eh eh! Ziggity zaggity zoo, eh eh! Ooh, ooh, ptht! Ah, ah, ptht! Flippity flappity floop! It's yours.
[Hassan dives into the treasure. Daffy looks on, disgusted]

[sarcastically]
Ickity ackity oop! Oh, oh, squeak, ah, ah, ptht...

[frantically offers Bugs a huge diamond]
Quick! Quick! Save me, pal, and it's yours! Gorgeous, isn't it? Don't be afraid. Have it appraised anyplace.
[Bugs tosses the diamond aside]
Proud punk!
